snippet: A health care company, EHE International, has donated the space in a window below its office to nonprofit organizations, mostly in the realm of health and wellness.
lead_paragraph: A health care company, EHE International, has donated the space in a window below its office to nonprofit organizations, mostly in the realm of health and wellness.

headline.seo: This Effort Opens a New Window, Every Month
